ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Stacking DOTS
ygData.msgSnippet: I know that both of you get the life back, but does the MOB lose life for both of you? I Remember when a necro could heal an entire party for just 800 HP with
ygData.messageBody:
I know that both of you get the life back, but does the MOB lose life for
both of you? I Remember when a necro could heal an entire party for just 800
HP with the transfer spell. Everyone got the HP, and the casting necro only
lost it once. Just a thought though.

Utelr Souldrinker
E Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Poppa [mailto:Poppa@...]
Sent: 27 March 2000 06:02
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Stacking DOTS


From: Poppa <Poppa@...>

My wife and I have discovered that Leach (lvl 12) stacks.. I can cast it
and moments
later she does and we both get the skull symbol on the screen and we both
get the life!

-Poppa



Naeeldar wrote:

> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
> Heh of course our dots don't stack with other necros that's not what he
was
> asking. he was asking if all the dots he has in his spellbook stack.
>
> The biggest problems with necros on big raids like planes and dragons is
> that our dots do not stack. The only dot that stacks with others is Bonds
of
> Death.
>
> Naeeldar Level 50 Dark Elf Necromancer
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: ashcroftjt@... <ashcroftjt@...>

> Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Stacking DOTS
>

> >
> ><< All the necro dots stack as long as it's not a lower level version of
> the

> >
> > Naeeldar Level 50 Dark Elf Necromancer
> > >>
> >
> > I 'll test tonight but I dont think your correct
> >
> >Im 50 I cast ignite blood , your 50th you cast ignite blood it will not
> stick
> >is my point,
> >same with any DOT two necros can not use same dots and stack. I may be
> wrong
> >I will test again. I know whenever I group with a necro we make sure we
> are
> >not casting same spells.
> > If Im understanding you.. your saying we both can cast ignite blood and
> >both stick for 2400 damage hmmmm.....
> >
> >Zakrell Lu' Dan
> >50th Tunare
> >
> >
